name: summerbrainrot
description: Summer Brain Rot - Strategic Learning Laboratory for Young Entrepreneurs

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run build:shared" "npm run dev:marketing" "npm run dev:portal"
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:marketing && npm run build:portal
scripts.build:shared: cd packages/shared-components && npm run build && cd ../types && npm run build
scripts.deploy:marketing: npm run build:marketing && firebase deploy --only hosting:marketing
scripts.deploy:portal: npm run build:portal && firebase deploy --only hosting:portal
scripts.lint: npm run lint:marketing && npm run lint:portal
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd packages/shared-components && npm install && cd ../types && npm install && cd ../../apps/marketing && npm install && cd ../portal && pnpm install
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:unit -- --run && npm run test:e2e
scripts.type-check: tsc --noEmit && cd packages/shared-components && npm run type-check && cd ../types && npm run type-check

author: Stephen Szermer
